message: It is shameful for the Miss PR Pageant organization to adopt such a radical position - did they forget we are Americans and we have the right to express our opinions? It is called 'First Amendment'!!! They are just cowards political correct acting under intimidation. Good for you Ms PR...you do not need cowards supporting or around you! You are a brave woman who can stand for yourself!
r exactly, not on a Main Street in NYC.
Also the murder suspect was found with his wrist slit.. He commited suicide! He took the cowards way out because he didn't want to go to jail.

Sadly, when an earthquake rocked the nation of Haiti in 2010, corruption moved in faster than the help so desperately needed. Today, the people of Haiti are still suffering despite the billions of dollars that have flowed into the Clinton Foundation. The Clintons exploited this terrible disaster to steal billions of dollars from the sick and starving people of Haiti. The world trusted the Clintons to help the Haitian people during their most desperate time of need and they were deceived. The Clintons and their friends are richer today while millions still live in tents. The world deserves to know where the money went and why help was never sent.

Just awful! And he's the one who's going to have to explain to his kids why he has to take it down and deal with their disappointment. We should be praising this man! A father who is actually spending quality time with his children!!!

I felt like if I watched it, I was a party to the crime. I would be giving him the notoriety he sought. Like the Ashley Madison data, if I accessed it after it was stolen I would be no better than the people who stole it. It would be like receiving money from a bank robbery. So, no, I won't watch and only wish he had killed himself first.

I think we should give credit where credit is due regardless of whether or not we voted for Trump or even like him. He is POTUS and you can pout about that and whine about that but he is still going to be POTUS. We fought hard against the TPP because it was a horrible bill that both Hillary Clinton and Obama tried desperately to shove down the throats of American workers. Like Bernie i am thrilled that legislation is dead. No more TPP. You would have had TPP shoved down your throats uncaring about whether you lost your jobs or not if Obama had his way and Clinton had her way. No, I did not vote for or support Donald Trump but I give him credit and thanks for killing the TPP I also think Bernie cannot expect Donald Trump to do everything right away when he just got elected. Give the man credit where it is due. Also, Bernie knows that the Republican Party wanted the TPP passed for corporate America along with Clinton and Obama. So another thing to be thankful for is that Trump did as Trump will do due to his ego, he is not allowing the Republicans to run the show and make choices for him. He is doing what I knew and others knew that Trump would do...he is making his on decisions. I don't agree with Trump signing an anti-abortion law as he did today. That is very harmful to women and I know as well as others know that Trump did it as a favor to the Religious Right ( more like the Religious Wrong) for helping him get elected. We are going to have to fight that. As I said, don't be so hate filled and petty as to not allow yourselves the good in this TPP decision just because you did not get the person elected that you wanted to win. That is just being petty. Give the man, Trump credit for the good he did the American workers and we will see where he goes from here. It may even be a bonus to all of us that Trump is a man of his own, had a huge ego, and likes to call the shots his self. That ego of his might keep the Republican Congress at bay when they learn he is not going to let them push him around. Might even save our Social Security. Who knows.
